oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The people in Tamme's country respect the mantis (||gan-a) and do not eat it. A person who eats the mantis dies. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-9.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Respect for the mantis
